description: This source file defines the Referral class, a data model used for representing referral information in the application. It utilizes json_serializable for JSON serialization/deserialization.

classes.name: Referral
classes.description: A data model class annotated for JSON serialization, containing userId, code, and rewards fields.

methods.name: Referral.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor for creating a Referral instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Converts the Referral instance into a JSON map.
